resetAccount:
**Functional Purpose**: Button to initiate account reset process
**UI Location**: Settings page (within a section for account management)
**When Users See This**: When they want to reset their account
**Technical Context**: Standard text for a button label
**Current English**: "Reset account"
field.mustBeNoLongerThan:
**Functional Purpose**: Validation error message for input fields exceeding max length
**UI Location**: Next to an input field that has an invalid entry
**When Users See This**: When a user inputs text longer than the allowed `maxLength` in a field
**Technical Context**: Variables `fieldName` and `maxLength` must remain unchanged
**Current English**: "{fieldName} must be no longer than {maxLength} characters"
deleteProfileModal.deleteProfile:
**Functional Purpose**: Title for the profile deletion confirmation modal
**UI Location**: Delete Profile modal heading
**When Users See This**: When opening the modal to confirm profile deletion
**Technical Context**: Standard modal title
**Current English**: "Delete profile?"
deleteProfileModal.areYouSure:
**Functional Purpose**: Confirmation message for profile deletion
**UI Location**: Delete Profile modal body
**When Users See This**: When opening the modal to confirm profile deletion
**Technical Context**: Standard modal body text
**Current English**: "Are you sure you want to delete your profile?"
deleteProfileModal.continue:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to proceed with profile deletion
**UI Location**: Delete Profile modal (primary action button)
**When Users See This**: When confirming to delete their profile
**Technical Context**: Button text for the primary action in the modal
**Current English**: "Continue"
deleteProfileModal.cancel:
**Functional Purpose**: Button label to cancel profile deletion
**UI Location**: Delete Profile modal (secondary action button)
**When Users See This**: When choosing not to delete their profile
**Technical Context**: Button text for the secondary action in the modal
**Current English**: "Cancel"
